subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: T. J. Lee blocked a punt and returned it 27 yards for a touchdown with 1 minute 52 seconds left as the Pirates upset the 17th-ranked Hokies, 27-22, leaving Beamer and his team stunned.
